posts.post_content:
Both cards sold.  Thank you all for the inquiries/interest.

Collins - This is a really nice example of a card that's one of the tougher Recruit class cards to find in grades at Ex (60/5) or better. - [STRIKE]$225[/STRIKE] [SOLD].

One of only 2 at SGC 80/6 (only one SGC 84/7 tops it).  Best PSA is a 5.

[IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=1167&pictureid=30020[/IMG]

Strunk - nice, clean PSA 6 (1/7 with 1 PSA 7 above) - [STRIKE]$175[/STRIKE][SOLD]

[IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=1167&pictureid=30021[/IMG]

Contact via PM, in thread or email to [url]mikefrohme@yahoo.com[/url].  Usual rules of "first to say I'll take it, gets it"
Prices net to me, Paypal, Check, open to other options if needed.

Thanks for looking.
